author: Defunctland
description:
So you made a robot stand up and talk... now what? In this over 4-hour journey, Kevin follows the promise of Disney's Living Character Initiative, a dedicated effort to populate Disney's theme parks with free-roaming, interactive, mechanical beings. It was touted as the future of theme parks, so how'd it go?

This video is the second in a duology. While it can be viewed in isolation, consider watching the first video, Disney's Animatronics: A Living History, here:
https://bit.ly/44n2PC7

We regret to have a credits omission:
Executive Producer - Bill Zanetti

Join Our Patreon for Exclusive Content:
https://patreon.com/defunctland
